explains: n. 流利的口才，流畅的文笔；雄辩术，修辞

sentences.en: She was struck by his simple, spellbinding eloquence.
sentences.cn: 她被他简洁、富有鼓动性的口才迷住了。

sentences.en: She can speak with an eloquence that is almost inspirational.
sentences.cn: 她能用一种近乎激发灵感的口才发言。

sentences.en: He is gifted with rare eloquence.
sentences.cn: 他天生具有罕见的口才。
